ext_descriptions.ext_description:
An Associated_leader is the association of a Detailed_geometric_model_element and a Leader_curve that ends on the geometric element. This association implies that a change in the definition of the target_item affects the Associated_leader in order to keep up consistency. If the target_item is a face and if the location of the face changes, then the leader will have to move in a way consistent with the movement of the face.
The purpose of this entity is the connection of annotation information with the geometric element that is documented by this information.
is the Detailed_geometric_model_element that is considered.

is the Leader_curve that ends onto the geometric element. As intent is mainly to relate a shape element with annotation information, no constraint is specified on the actual distance between the leader curve end and the shape element. It shall only be small enough to enable a good visual identification of the documented geometric element.
A Leader_curve is a type of Styled_model_element that presents a curve.
is the Curve that is presented.
A Text_occurrence is a type of Styled_element that presents a text.
is the Presentable_text_item or Composite_presentable_text that is presented.

A Text_with_leader is a type of Text_occurrence with an additional Leader_curve.
The Text_with_leader and the Leader_curve shall be items of a same Representation.

is the Leader_curve that is associated with the text occurrence.
The purpose of this entity is the connection of annotation information with a curve that points to some geometric element. No constraint is specified on the actual distance between the leader curve end and the text occurrence. It shall only be small enough to enable an easy visual association between the curve and the text.

An Item_text_association is the association of a Shape_element, represented by a particular Detailed_geometric_model_element, with a Text_occurrence that provides related text information about the shape element.
The purpose of this entity is the connection of annotation information with the shape element that is documented by this information.
The Text_occurrence may be a Text_with_leader in case a leader curve is used to refer to the documented shape element.
The association between the annotation text and what it documents is visual. This is the reason why it is established at a representation level, with a geometric element.
The target_geometry and the text shall be items of a same Representation.
No constraint is specified on the actual distance between the text occurrence or its leader curve and the target_geometry. It shall only be small enough to enable an easy visual association between the target_geometry and the text.
is the Shape_element that is documented.
is the Detailed_geometric_model_element that represents the Shape_element and that is associated with the Text_occurrence in the visual presentation.
is the Text_occurrence that presents text information related to the shape element.
